description.trigger: WooCommerce is an open-source e-commerce plugin for WordPress that allows users to transform their WordPress website into a fully functional online store, enabling them to sell physical and digital products, manage inventory, users and orders.
description.integration: WooCommerce is an open-source e-commerce plugin for WordPress that allows users to transform their WordPress website into a fully functional online store, enabling them to sell physical and digital products, manage inventory, users and orders.
